title: City Inside/Out: Council Edition - April 2019
description: What role will the newest member of the Seattle City Council have in shaping city policy? Do city leaders support building light rail tunnels to West Seattle and Ballard? How would a "regional homeless authority" help local leaders respond to the homelessness crisis? Plus, does Seattle need city-funded childcare? Councilmembers Sally Bagshaw and M. Lorena González discuss these topics with host Brian Callanan and respond to questions from viewers on Council Edition.
